<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
</I>
<B>
	Directorate General for the Protection of Working Conditions and Industrial Relations
</B>
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	SECTION VI
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The Parties agree that the SC, i.e. the reduction of working hours, shall involve all office and shop floor
	employees working in the 4 &#147;operational&#148; units identified above in the recitals and in the Headquarters at Santeramo in Colle with due exception to cases of inapplicability to roles that require presence at work for the contractual period
	without the possibility to reschedule activities within the same week or month on the basis of an assessment made by the Company; in this respect the Company hereby declares that within the first week of April of this year there will be a meeting at
	the premises of the Confederation of Industries (Confindustria) of Bari for the purpose of checking the way in which the SC will be applied also taking into account the issue of inapplicability to certain roles, with specific reference to the
	maintenance department. The Company shall present a request to have access to extraordinary salary integration, as justified by a SC, for the benefit of a maximum of 1,915 workers (as per attached schedule which constitutes an integral part of this
	Agreement) for a term of 12 months starting from 02/05/2016 to 01/05/2017;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The list of workers who shall be involved in the SC is attached to this MoU of which it is an integral part;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The Parties agree to an average reduction of working time of 40% for workers involved in the SC taking into
	account the organization of work and the requirements related to peak work-loads as dictated by delivery times of specific orders;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Specifically, the Parties agree that normally the reduction of working hours, in accordance with the above
	indicated percentage, shall be implemented by reducing working hours over a day and/or a week without prejudice to the possibility - for work constraints that can not otherwise be avoided - to identify alternative periods of fruition of the reduced
	hours of work that are more amenable to the technical and production requirements so as to guarantee adequate flexibility, efficiency and speed of response for the Company, subject to consultation with the Union Specific and Company Specific
	Workers&#146; representative bodies at least one week in advance.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Normally, the Company shall communicate with the Union Specific and Company Specific Workers&#146;
	representative bodies on a weekly basis the way in which the reduction of working hours will be scheduled.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The CS shall involve &#147;horizontal&#148; and &#147;vertical&#148; part-time employment on a weekly basis in
	proportion to the % of reduction of working hours for the other workers. In any case, the Parties agree that, given the complexity of the company organization and for the purpose of protecting the efficiency of the services provided, it will be
	possible to articulate a reduction of working hours in those sections that are more closely related to production and to customer service and in any case activities that are functional to company management operations;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The Parties acknowledge that given the way that the work is organized, the adopted system of reduction of
	working hours is the only one that is technically possible and that the reduction of working hours implemented in this manner makes it possible to limit the number of redundant personnel and to use personnel in the most profitable manner. During the
	monitoring meetings, following the request of one of the Parties, there will be an assessment of the extent to which the reduction of working hours was distributed fairly depending on and complying with the technical, organizational and production
	requirements and the specific nature of market service calls;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	DIRECTORATE GENERAL FOR
	THE PROTECTION OF WORKING CONDITIONS AND INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Via Fornovo 8 - 00192 - ROMA
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Tel. 06 46834282 - Fax 06 46834278
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	E mail
<U>
	dgtutelacondizionilavorodiv6@lavoro.gov.it
</U>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage152"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/05/23/0001193125-16-598629_G190845G96P77.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
	Ministry of Labour
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
	and Social Policy
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
</I>
<B>
	Directorate General for the Protection of Working Conditions and Industrial Relations
</B>
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	SECTION VI
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The Company shall advance the payment of the salary integration scheme as per Article 3 of the Legislative
	Decree No.&nbsp;148/2015 and in any case up to the maximum amount of funds made available under such scheme; in this regard, the remuneration shall be commensurate with the work that was actually carried out, by deducting the hours that have not
	been worked, applying the monthly divisor as established by the National Labour Collective Agreements. It is expressly agreed and specified that the reduction of working hours will, in any event, result in the prorating of all direct and indirect
	contractual obligations for the Company as set forth by applicable law; regarding the payment of the Employee Termination Indemnities, reference is made to the provisions of Paragraph 5 of Article 21 of the Legislative Decree No.&nbsp;148/2015;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	The Company shall assess the possibility to hire people with specific professional skills who are not
	available in the Company, as such skills may become necessary for carrying out company activities and/or as required in specific sectors/offices, also following the sudden, permanent or long term absence that may be determined for any reason by
	internal personnel. Initially the Company shall be committed to ascertain the possibility to meet such requirements by suspending or terminating definitively the provision of reduction of working hours for a number of workers who have adequate
	qualifications and professional competence related to the activity that needs to be carried out subject to consultation with the Union Specific and Company specific Workers&#146; representative bodies and the local/regional sections of the Trade
	Unions.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Without prejudice to the foregoing, the Company shall continue with training initiatives aimed at achieving
	adequate levels of professional skill in the position of &#147;frame assembler&#148; and for this purpose a first test will take place in the experimental workshop in Santeramo in Colle.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	Reiterating that for the purpose of success of the agreed industrial plan, the Company shall not be allowed to
	increase its workforce with respect to its, albeit reduced, current level of 1915 employees spread over 4 production plants and its headquarters. The Company shall be committed to proceed, in accordance with the technical, organizational and
	production requirements of the company, with the practice of rep&ecirc;chage of workers from those who are suspended from work under the Special Fund for the Integration of Earnings (CIGS) scheme in Ginosa, for all those workers who might for any
	reason terminate their employment in the sites that are involved in the SC initiative.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	With reference to the provisions of Paragraph 5 of Article 21 of the above mentioned Legislative Decree, the
	Parties expressly agree that in the event of a temporary need for more working resources (e.g. related to meeting the delivery deadline of orders), the number of hours of work can be increased and the reduction of working hours as provided by the SC
	can be changed or temporarily suspended by notifying such changes to the Union Specific and Company Specific Workers&#146; representative bodies. In this case the Company shall pay the normal employment contract remuneration for such additional
	hours and shall not request any salary integration as provided in the above mentioned Paragraph 5 of Article 21;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	DIRECTORATE GENERAL FOR
	THE PROTECTION OF WORKING CONDITIONS AND INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Via Fornovo 8 - 00192 - ROMA
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/05/23/0001193125-16-598629_G190845G96P77.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
	Ministry of Labour
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
	and Social Policy
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
</I>
<B>
	Directorate General for the Protection of Working Conditions and Industrial Relations
</B>
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	SECTION VI
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
	During the year in which the SC is implemented there will be quarterly assessment and monitoring meetings
	related to company progress and the application of the SC. The signatories of this MoU will meet to analyse the data related to the extent to which the SC was used and to assess prospects for future periods.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	By signing this MoU the Parties agree to activate the SC in accordance with Paragraph 1 letter c of Article 21 and Paragraph 5 of Article 22
	of the Legislative Decree 148/2015, also taking into account the provisions of Articles 3 and 4 of the Ministerial Decree No.&nbsp;94033/2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	Acknowledging the agreement reached between the Parties, this Ministerial office shall promptly transmit this MoU to its IV Division -
	Directorate General for Social Safety Net Measures and employment incentives - for carrying out the data gathering and decision making phase for which it is responsible.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Read, confirmed and signed
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	For the Ministry of
	Labour and Social Policy by:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	conversations, please find below our agreements reached in relation to the following

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	RECEIVABLES
</I>

	BETWEEN:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	Natuzzi S.p.A., with its head office at Via Iazzitiello No.&nbsp;47, Santeramo in Colle (BA), a fully paid-up share
	capital of &#128;54,853,045.00, tax ID and VAT no. 03513760722, Bari Business Register entry no. BA-261878, by way of special legal representative Vittorio Notarpietro, born in Ostuni (BR) on 19&nbsp;March 1963 and having chosen the company&#146;s
	head office as a correspondence address for the role (&#147;

</I>
</B>
<I>
	&#148; or &#147;

<I>
	&#148;), with its head office at Via Alessandro Pestalozza, No.&nbsp;12-14, Milan, with tax ID and Milan Business Register entry no. 09094800969, in the process of registration in the &#147;list of
	financial vehicle corporations&#148; kept by the Bank of Italy in accordance with Article 2 of the Bank of Italy provision of 29&nbsp;April 2011, relating exclusively to the performance of one or more receivable securitisation operations, within the
	meaning of Article 3 of the Securitisation Law (&#147;

	the Securitisation Law, the ownership and all connected rights (including interests and other accessories) and benefits held by the Assigner with respect to certain receivables deriving from the exercise of the business activity indicated in the
	previous Recital (A)&nbsp;in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth below. Such purchases are related to the performance by the Assignee of a securitisation operation (hereinafter &#147;

<I>

	accordance with the Securitisation Law.

	Assigner acknowledges that the Assignee has agreed to enter into this Agreement on the basis of the availability, capacity and commitment of the Sub-Servicer to act in such capacities in accordance with the Sub-Servicing Agreement;

	the Parties agree to the following.

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	The terms and expressions with a capital initial used in this agreement shall have the meaning assigned to
	them in Attachment 1 (Definitions and interpretation), except where such terms are defined in other parts or clauses of this Agreement, in which case their meaning shall be that assigned to them in the definitions given in those other parts or
	clauses of the Agreement.

	forth in Attachment 1 (Definitions and interpretation), supplementing the legal rules of interpretation.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	2.1
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Purpose of the Agreement
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The purpose of this Agreement is the assignment, not in bulk and without recourse (without any guarantee
	from the Assigner against non-fulfilment or insolvency of the assigned debtor), by the Assigner to the Assignee, in accordance with Article 4.1 of the Securitisation Law, of the ownership of Portfolios of Eligible Receivables held with Eligible
	Debtors indicated in the Debtor List, along with all rights and interests (including, for purposes of clarity, any Late Payment Interest accrued after the relevant Purchase Date) and other accessories related to such Eligible Receivables in
	accordance with the transfer procedures and conditions set forth in Attachment 3 (operating procedure for the sale of Eligible Receivables), on the condition that each of the Portfolios satisfies all the Portfolio Criteria set forth in Article 2.5
	below.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	It is understood that the Assigner shall have the right to assign, on each Offer Date, Eligible Receivables
	held with new Eligible Debtors not previously included in the Debtor List provided that both the following conditions are met:
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	the Assigner has communicated to the Assignee and the Portfolio Manager in writing, including via email,
	the names and all other information necessary for the identification in accordance with Attachment 12 and for analysing the risk profile of such new Debtors, the duration of the commercial relationship with each of such new Eligible Debtors and the
	amount of the Eligible Receivables held with them before the Proposed Eligible Debtor List Modification Date immediately preceding the relevant Offer Date; and
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	by the Eligible Debtor List Modification Date immediately preceding the relevant Offer Date, the Assignee
	(including through its Portfolio Manager) has given the Assigner its written consent to the inclusion of such new Eligible Debtors in the Debtor List and has sent to the Assigner a new Debtor List which includes such new Eligible Debtors.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage157"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:15%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The foregoing is notwithstanding the right of the Assignee (including through
	its Portfolio Manager) to subsequently exclude one or more of such new Eligible Debtors in accordance with Article 2.4.3 below.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_84"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.1.3
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Notwithstanding the terms of Article 2.1.4 below, where the Outstanding Amount of the Assigned Receivables
	is less than the Maximum Portfolio Amount, the Assigner shall present to the Assignee and to the Portfolio Manager new Eligible Debtors not previously included in the Debtor List, under the terms and conditions set forth in Article 2.1.2 above
	(whose inclusion &#150; as mentioned &#150; is dependent upon the consent of the Assignee, which may be given through the Portfolio Manager), in order for the Maximum Portfolio Amount to be reached.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.1.4
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Should the Assigner declare to the Assignee and to the Portfolio Manager that it is unable to present new
	Eligible Debtors or has presented new Eligible Debtors but has not obtained the consent of the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) in accordance with Article 2.1.3, the Parties shall mutually negotiate, reasonably, in good faith and
	taking into account the seasonality of sales, a reduction in the Maximum Portfolio Amount proportionate to the reduction in the Outstanding Amount of Assigned Receivables.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	2.2
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Assignment of First Portfolio
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_85"></A>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	On the First Offer Date, the Assigner shall be entitled (but not obligated) to offer for sale to the
	Assignee a Portfolio of Eligible Receivables (&#147;First Portfolio&#148;) and the Assignee shall be entitled (but not obligated) to purchase the First Portfolio offered for sale.
</I>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

	2.2.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties also agree that the First Portfolio may comprise all Receivables still to be collected as of
	the First Cut-Off Date (inclusive) and with an invoice Issue Date not prior to 1&nbsp;April 2015 (inclusive).
</I>
</P>
</TD>

<I>
	2.3
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">

</I>

	&nbsp;

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_86"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.3.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	After the First Portfolio is purchased, the Assigner, on each Offer Date for each month that passes during
	the Revolving Period, shall be required to offer for sale to the Assignee a Subsequent Portfolio which includes all Eligible Receivables held by the Assigner with the Eligible Debtors, and the Assignee, notwithstanding the provisions of Articles
	2.3.3, 2.7 and 5, shall be required to purchase each Subsequent Portfolio offered for sale, such that each collection relating to each Assigned Receivable included in a Subsequent Portfolio belongs to the Assignee and is therefore collected &#150;
	through the Assigner, as Sub-Servicer (in accordance with the Sub-Servicing Agreement) &#150; by the Assignee.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	2.3.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties agree that each Subsequent Portfolio shall comprise all Receivables that are Eligible
	Receivables and which have not yet been assigned to the Assignee in accordance with this Agreement, notwithstanding the provisions of Articles 2.3.3 and 2.5.1 below.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Assigner shall select the Eligible Receivables to be offered to the Assignee in accordance with this
	Agreement in such a way as to ensure that, at each Cut-Off Date immediately preceding an Offer Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in Article 2.3.1 above) or at each Collection Transfer Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in
	Article 2.3.4 below), all Portfolio Criteria referred to in Article 2.5 below are met.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Following the purchase of the First Portfolio and in addition to the provisions of Article 2.3.1 above (and
	therefore in addition to the sale to the Assignee, at each Offer Date, of a Subsequent Portfolio of Eligible Receivables according to the terms set forth therein), the
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage158"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Assigner, at each Collection Transfer Date which passes during the Revolving Period &#150; with the exception of each Collection Transfer Date immediately preceding a Payment Date &#150; may
	offer for sale to the Assignee a Subsequent Portfolio of Eligible Receivables. The Assignee, notwithstanding the provisions of Articles 2.3.3, 2.7 and 5, shall be required to purchase each Subsequent Portfolio offered for sale on such Collection
	Transfer Date, such that each collection relating to each Assigned Receivable included in a Subsequent Portfolio belongs to the Assignee and is therefore collected &#150; through the Assigner, as Sub-Servicer (in accordance with the Sub-Servicing
	Agreement) &#150; by the Assignee.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_87"></A>

</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties agree that each Subsequent Portfolio offered by the Assigner in accordance with Article 2.3.4
	above shall comprise all Receivables that are Eligible Receivables and which have not yet been assigned to the Assignee in accordance with this Agreement, notwithstanding the provisions of Articles 2.3.3 and 2.5.1 below.
</I>
</P>
</TD>

</I>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_88"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<I>
	2.4.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties agree and acknowledge that the Eligible Receivables offered at each Offer Date or, where
	applicable, on a Collection Transfer Date are to be held with Debtors which, as of the Cut-Off Date prior to the respective Offer Date or Collection Transfer Date, are included in the Debtor List (&#147;
</I>
<B>
<I>
	Eligible
	Debtors
</I>
</B>
<I>
	&#148;).
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.4.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Notwithstanding the indications given in Article 2.1.2 above, each Eligible Debtor included in the Debtor
	List, as of the relative Cut-Off Date or Collection Transfer Date, must satisfy all the following requirements:
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(a)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	must be a resident of or have a base in Italy or in the European Union or in the following countries:
	United States, Canada or United Arab Emirates, or any other country previously authorised by the Portfolio Manager;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(b)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	must be subject to Italian jurisdiction or the jurisdiction of the country of residence;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(c)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	must not be a subsidiary of Natuzzi in accordance with Article 2359.1.1 of the Italian Civil Code and must
	not be a part of the Natuzzi Group;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(d)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	must not be a physical person (with the exception of sole proprietorships);
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(e)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	as far as the Assigner is aware, the Debtor is not insolvent and no Receivable held with that Debtor is
	classified as a Receivable in Dispute solely within the meaning of points i) and iv) contained in the definition of Receivables in Dispute;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>

<I>
	(f)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	must not have delayed or interrupted the payment of Assigned Receivables referring to it in relation to:
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	i)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	a legal dispute regarding a supply of Products in any respect and based on reasonably founded motives; or
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	ii)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	an out-of-court dispute regarding a supply of Products, drafted in writing, in any respect and based on
	reasonably founded motives and such dispute is not settled with an agreement within two months from the date it is filed;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</I>
</TD>

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	any objection regarding a supply of Products that could compromise the existence and/or collectability of
	the related Receivable (including, without limitation, any objection to compensation), provided that such objection was made in writing and is not settled with an agreement within two months after it is filed;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

	5
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	the Commercial Agreement on which the respective Receivable is based has not been terminated at the
	discretion of any of the parties and has not expired or, where it has expired, the Receivable in question was lawfully created during the contractual relationship.
</I>
</P>
</TD>

	changes made in relation to Eligible Debtors in terms of their personal details and/or insurance coverage, using the form given in Attachment 13. By the following Eligible Debtor List Modification Date, the Assignee shall submit to the Assigner the
	Debtor List updated using the form given in Attachment 10.

</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties agree to and acknowledge the following:
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(a)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Assignee may assess and ascertain &#150; based on its reasonable judgement &#150; any significant
	deterioration in the economic/financial situation and/or payment capacity of any Eligible Debtor included in the Debtor List (including any new Eligible Debtor added to the Debtor List in accordance with Article 2.1.2 above) which causes, based on
	the reasonable judgement of the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager), a deterioration in the credit risk of the Portfolio (including, but not limited to, the circumstance that one or more Insurance Companies has &#150; for reasons not
	attributable to the Assignee &#150; reduced or cancelled the Insurance Ceiling granted with respect to that Eligible Debtor). In such case, the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) may, at its own discretion and by sending a written
	communication to the Assigner before each Eligible Debtor Modification Date, notify the Assigner:
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(i)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	of the exclusion from the Debtor List of such Eligible Debtors previously included in the Debtor List
	(&#147;
</I>
<B>
<I>
	Excluded Debtors
</I>
</B>
<I>
	&#148;); or
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	(ii)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	of the modification to the Agreed Ceiling by the Assignee in relation to the Eligible Debtor in question,
	indicating such change in the Debtor List;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(b)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	in the case referred to in section (a)(i) above, as of the Offer Date immediately after such communication
	(inclusive), the Assigner may no longer offer to the Assignee, and the Assignee shall no longer be required in any way to purchase, any Eligible Receivable held by the Assigner with any Excluded Debtor until the circumstances and events for which
	the Excluded Debtors were excluded have ceased or been permanently eliminated;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</I>

<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	any exclusion of an Eligible Debtor from the Debtor List and any reduction in the Agreed Ceiling relating
	to an Eligible Debtor having already reached the maximum Agreed Ceiling with previous assignments shall not in any way compromise or have any effect on the validity and efficacy of assignments of Eligible Receivables already made prior to such
	exclusion/reduction of the Agreed Ceiling, which shall therefore remain valid and in effect between the Parties within the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</I>
</P>

<I>
	2.4.5
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Parties expressly agree that if any Insurance Policy issued by an Insurance Company to Natuzzi should
	be modified by Natuzzi without the prior consent of the Assignee, the Debtor covered by that Insurance Policy shall be considered as an Excluded Debtor in accordance with Article 2.4.4 above, notwithstanding that the Assignee may not unreasonably
	withhold its prior consent to any non-damaging modification to any Insurance Policy with respect to conditions relating to coverage of risk.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

	6
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	2.5
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Portfolio criteria
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_91"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.5.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Without prejudice to the Eligibility Criteria indicated in Attachment 2, the Assigner shall select the
	Eligible Receivables to be offered for sale to the Assignee in accordance with this Agreement in such a way as to ensure that, at each Cut-Off Date other than the First Cut-Off Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in Article 2.3.1 above)
	or at each Collection Transfer Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in Article 2.3.4 below), the portfolio comprising such Eligible Receivables satisfies all of the following criteria (&#147;
</I>
<B>
<I>
	Portfolio Criteria
</I>
</B>
<I>
	&#148;):
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(i)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	the Outstanding Amount of all Assigned Receivables existing at such Cut-Off Date or at such Collection
	Transfer Date and of the Eligible Receivables offered for assignment at the same Offer Date and, where applicable, at a Collection Transfer Date does not exceed the Maximum Portfolio Amount, in each case as calculated on the Cut-Off Date preceding
	the relative Offer Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in Article 2.3.1 above) or on the relative Collection Transfer Date (with regard to the optional assignment referred to in Article 2.3.4 above). It is to be understood that if the
	Maximum Portfolio Amount should be exceeded and the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) does not notify the Assigner of its intention to purchase Eligible Receivables above the Maximum Portfolio Amount, the Assignee (including through
	the Portfolio Manager) may choose, in relation to the relevant Offer Date or Collection Transfer Date, the Eligible Receivables to be excluded &#150; and in relation to which the related Eligible Receivables shall not be assigned at the Offer Date
	or Collection Transfer Date immediately thereafter &#150; following the procedures set forth in Article 2.5.2 below, in order to comply with the Maximum Programme Amount;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	in regard to certain Assigned Debtors indicated by the Assignee, the Outstanding Amount of all Assigned
	Receivables existing at such Cut-Off Date or at such Collection Transfer Date held with each Assigned Debtor (including Eligible Receivables offered for assignment at the Offer Date after the relevant Cut-Off Date or, with regard to the assignment
	referred to in Article 2.3.4 above, at the relevant Collection Transfer Date) shall not exceed the Assignee&#146;s Agreed Ceiling indicated in the Debtor List (as amended on occasion), as calculated at the Cut-Off Date preceding the relative Offer
	Date (with regard to the assignment referred to in Article 2.3.1 above) or at the relative Collection Transfer Date (with regard to the optional assignment referred to in Article 2.3.4 above). It is to be understood that where the Agreed Ceiling of
	an Eligible Debtor is exceeded and the Assignee has not notified the Assigner of its intention to purchase Eligible Receivables related to that debtor above the Agreed Ceiling applicable thereto, the Receivables held with that Eligible Debtor shall
	not be assigned at the Offer Date or at the Collection Transfer Date immediately thereafter. For as long as the Agreed Ceiling is exceeded, the relevant Eligible Debtor shall be excluded according to the procedures set forth in Article 2.5.2 below.
	It is to be understood that the Assignee may update the Agreed Ceiling for each Assigned Debtor on a monthly basis, promptly notifying the Assigner of any such modification.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_92"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.5.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Where the limits envisaged in part (i)&nbsp;of Article 2.5.1 above are exceeded, the Assigner shall notify
	(including via email) the Assignee and the Portfolio Manager within the period between (x)&nbsp;the Cut-Off Date preceding the relevant Offer Date, and (y)&nbsp;the subsequent Report Date, or the relevant Collection Transfer Date. After receiving
	such notification, the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) shall promptly send to the Assigner a
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	7
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	list of Eligible Debtors to be excluded. It is to be understood however that if the Assignee does not consent to the limit referred to in part (ii)&nbsp;of Article 2.5.1 above being exceeded, the
	Assigner may present to the Assignee new Eligible Receivables held with Eligible Debtors in relation to which the Agreed Ceiling has not been exceeded.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_93"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.5.3
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Without prejudice to Article 2.5.4 below, the Assigner and the Assignee (including through the Portfolio
	Manager) shall assess the Portfolio Criteria set forth in Article 2.5.1 above on each Calculation Date immediately prior to each Renewal Date in order to agree upon any changes that such Parties may deem necessary. Any changes to the Portfolio
	Criteria set forth in Article 2.5.1 agreed upon between the Assigner and the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) shall apply starting from the relevant Renewal Date, notwithstanding that if such Parties do not reach an agreement in
	regard to such changes by the Calculation Date immediately preceding such Renewal Date, the Portfolio Criteria applicable as of said Calculation Date shall continue to apply in accordance with this Agreement.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.5.4
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	On each Calculation Date, the Assigner may submit a written request to the Assignee and the Portfolio
	Manager for an increase in the Maximum Portfolio Amount. In such case, the Parties shall negotiate such increase in good faith and according to correctness, notwithstanding that: (i)&nbsp;the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) shall
	be under no obligation whatsoever to accept the increase in the Maximum Portfolio Amount proposed by the Assigner, and (ii)&nbsp;any increase in the Maximum Portfolio Amount agreed between the Assigner and the Assignee (including through the
	Portfolio Manager) shall only apply after the Offer Date immediately following that on which such agreement is reached between the Parties.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.5.5
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Assigner shall ensure that, during the Revolving Period: a) the Outstanding Amount of Assigned
	Receivables in euro does not fall below &#128;1.5&nbsp;million (one point five million euro); and b) the Outstanding Amount of Assigned Receivables in United States dollars does not fall below $3.5 million (three point five million United States
	dollars).
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<B>
<I>
	2.6
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">

<I>
	Consideration
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The assignment and transfer of each Portfolio in accordance with this Agreement and of each Assignment Agreement shall be in
	exchange for a consideration equivalent to the Purchase Price, calculated according to the indications given in Attachment 4 (Calculation of the Purchase Price) and notified in accordance with the provisions of Attachment 3 (Operating Procedure for
	the Sale of Eligible Receivables), which shall be paid within the terms and conditions indicated in detail in Article 4 below.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<I>
	2.7
</I>
</B>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	Events that may affect the purchase of Subsequent Portfolios
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree &#150; and the Assigner expressly acknowledges &#150; that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_94"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.7.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The commitment of the Assignee to purchase the Receivables included in each Subsequent Portfolio in
	accordance with this Agreement shall be subject to the absence of any financial tensions that may arise due to significant harmful events impacting the capital market and which have the consequence of significantly limiting the Assignee&#146;s
	ability to secure short-term funding from the market in order to pay the relevant Purchase Price;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	2.7.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	should the circumstance indicated in Article 2.7.1 occur, the Assignee shall not be required to purchase
	the Receivables and may choose not to accept the relevant offers of assignment where it sends to the Assigner, by the fifth Business Day prior to the relevant Purchase Date, a written communication confirming &#150; in good faith and according to
	objective parameters &#150; the existence of the aforementioned financial tensions and giving evidence thereof.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	8

<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<I>
	Where the circumstances indicated in Articles 2.7.1 and 2.7.2 continue for six
	subsequent Offer Dates, the Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager) may terminate the Revolving Period by sending to the Assigner a unilateral notification of withdrawal with immediate effect (and without the application of any penalty or
	compensation).
</I>
</P>

	Each assignment of Eligible Receivables shall take effect on the Purchase Date immediately after the
	related Offer Date (excluding assignment of the First Portfolio which shall take effect as upon acceptance of the proposed conclusion of the Assignment Agreement, including through payment by the Assignee of the corresponding Purchase Price in
	accordance with Article 1327 of the Italian Civil Code) with economic effects, in each case, starting from the previous Cut-Off Date. Consequently, the Parties agree that:

	The Parties agree to fully cooperate in carrying out any reasonable additional activity that may be necessary to facilitate
	the transfer of Eligible Receivables within the terms set forth in this Article 2 and according to the transfer procedures set forth in Attachment 3 (Operating procedure for the sale of Eligible Receivables).
</I>

</I>

	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	each assignment of Eligible Receivables carried out in accordance with this Agreement also includes the
	assignment, to the Assignee, of any Accessory Amount (including Late Payment Interest) of the respective Eligible Receivables;
</I>

	with the Sub-Servicing Agreement;
</I>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	(iv)
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	such Accessory Amounts are to be paid to the Assignee within the terms and conditions indicated in Article
	8 below.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	2.11
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Assignment of Insurance Policy benefits
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The Assigner assigns (and undertakes to assign) to the Assignee in accordance with this Agreement all benefits and interests
	deriving from present and future Insurance Policies related to Receivables Assigned from time to time; it also undertakes to carry out any activities that may be necessary to fulfil such assignment including, where requested by the Assignee,
	notification of the assignment to the relevant Insurance Company in accordance with Articles 1260 et seq. of the Italian Civil Code. All existing Insurance Policies must be taken out in the name of the Assignee or another entity designated by the
	Assignee not later than 31&nbsp;July 2015. It is naturally to be understood that any amounts paid out by the Insurance Company to the Assigner by way of compensation under the Insurance Policies on Assigned Receivables must be promptly paid and
	transferred to the Assignee.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	3
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
<U>
	NATURE OF ASSIGNMENTS
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	3.1
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Assignment without recourse
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The Parties agree that the transfer of Assigned Receivables to the Assignee shall be without recourse and without any nature
	of guarantee from the Assigner in regard to the solvency of each Assigned Debtor.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The Assignee therefore fully and
	expressly waives the guarantee of solvency in relation to Assigned Receivables.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	3.2
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Right to notify Assigned Debtors
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	The Assignee (including through the Portfolio Manager), at its own discretion and having informed the Assigner in advance,
	may report the assignment of Assigned Receivables it has purchased to:
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_97"></A>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	3.2.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	all Assigned Debtors, where the appointment of the Sub-Servicer in accordance with Article 9 of the
	Sub-Servicing Agreement is revoked; and/or
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	3.2.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	each Assigned Debtor having been classified as an Insolvent Debtor and, where the debtor is insured, the
	deadlines for reporting an accident set forth in the relevant insurance policy have elapsed &#150; without prejudice to the provisions governing the management of the Receivable in question set forth in the Sub-Servicing Agreement; and/or
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	3.2.3
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	each Eligible Debtor having been notified of the Assignment of Receivables from the Assigner to the
	Assignee, where the relevant Receivable is re-transferred from the Assignee to the Assigner within the circumstances set forth in this Agreement
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	(including through the transfer to each Assigned Debtor of any act or document confirming the transfer), and may to request
	the reasonable collaboration of the Assigner and/or Sub-Servicer in such respect.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	3.3
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Assignment of receivable but not of agreement
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<I>
	For purposes of clarity, each assignment of Receivables carried out by virtue of this Agreement shall not imply the transfer
	of the corresponding Commercial Agreement, nor shall it impose on the Assignee any obligation pursuant to such agreement or other obligations assumed by the Assigner towards Assigned Debtors based on the corresponding Commercial Agreement or any
	other agreement.
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	10
</P>

<I>
	4.1
</I>
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<B>
<I>
	Calculation of Purchase Price
</I>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<I>
	4.1.1
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	The Purchase Price for each Portfolio sold in accordance with this Agreement shall be equal to the total of
	the Individual Purchase Prices of Receivables (calculated following the indications given in Attachment 4 (Calculation of Purchase Price)) purchased by the Assignee on the relevant Purchase Date and shall be paid to the Assignee according to the
	procedures indicated in this Article 4.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<I>
	4.1.2
</I>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="JUSTIFY" STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:0PT ; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<I>
	Attachment 4 (Calculation of Purchase Price) lays down the procedures for calculating the Individual
	Purchase Price of each Eligible Receivable.
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</I>
</B>
</P>
